translation.en: And the doctor tells him, "Mr. Greenberg, you had a car accident."

translation.en: "The good new is you're fine."
translation.ja: “命に別条ありません”

translation.en: "The bad news is we couldn't save… your…"
translation.ja: “しかし残念なことにあなたの…”

translation.en: I'll clean it up, "your… your privates."
translation.ja: 言葉を変える “大事なところは救えませんでした”

translation.en: "We couldn't save them, but…

translation.en: there is some more good news."
translation.ja: “でもいいお知らせがあります”

translation.en: "We can reconstruct."
translation.ja: “再建が可能です”

translation.en: "We understand you're gonna receive $9,000 from the insurance company."
translation.ja: “保険会社から9000ドルを受け取るでしょう”

translation.en: "Which will come in handy 'cause it's $1,000 an inch to reconstruct."
translation.ja: “再建は２.５センチにつき1000ドルです”

translation.en: Yep.

translation.en: He goes, "Now, you may want to spend the whole nine."
translation.ja: “全額使った方がいいと思いますが”

translation.en: "That's probably a conversation you should have with your wife, maybe." "There's no rush."
translation.ja: “奥さんとよく相談してください”

translation.en: "On the other hand, you may want to spend 4,000 or 5,000." "That's another conversation."
translation.ja: “4000ドルか5000ドルでもいいかもしれません”

translation.en: "Go home, talk it over, come back when you're ready."
translation.ja: “奥さんと話して決まったら来てください”

translation.en: So he leaves, and a week later, he comes back in the office…
translation.ja: 彼は１週間後に病院へやって来た

translation.en: to the doctor's office, and he comes in,

translation.en: and the doctor says, "Mr. Greenberg, good to see you."

translation.en: "Did you talk it over with your wife?"

translation.en: He says… The doctor says, "And what did you decide?"

translation.en: He says, uh, "We're getting granite countertops."
